silver bullet




3:18 minutes (6.04 MB)

silver bullet




i don't need your silver bullet baby

i don't want to play your midnight games

don't hold me up against the fire

I'm not the only one

who doesn't feel the same




if we're lost for however long it takes

and somebody leads us through the night

if you keep your eyes closed

and believe the status quo

you'll never know you didn't fight




i don't need your silver bullet baby



By Krister Axel on 06/20 2008 at 03_00 in Song
